rules.text: Favor immutability; isolate side effects at boundaries.
Keep stratified design: DSL independent of writers; writers never mutate AST.
Use expressive types: prefer Option/Result and discriminated unions; avoid exceptions; ensure exhaustive pattern matches.
Write small, composable functions with idiomatic pipelines and computation expressions; avoid unnecessary abstraction.
Follow naming conventions: PascalCase for types/modules, camelCase for values; keep modules cohesive.
